description: Plots points four quadrants for educational visualization.
example_usage:
# Example usage for plot_points_four_quadrants
result = plot_points_four_quadrants(data)

educational_standards.description: Recognize that when two ordered pairs differ only by signs, the locations of the points are related by being reflections across one or both axes.
Find and position pairs of integers and other rational numbers on a coordinate plane.
Find the distance between two points on the coordinate plane.
Follow directions on a coordinate plane.
Apply the Pythagorean Theorem to find the distance between two points in a coordinate system where the unknown distance between the points is the hypotenuse.
